## LocalDurableTestRunner.getOperationByNameAndIndex() method

Gets an operation by name and index when multiple operations have the same name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOperationByNameAndIndex<TOperationResult = any>(name: string, index: number): DurableOperation<TOperationResult>;
```

</td></tr>

[DurableOperation](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.durableoperation.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOperationResult&gt;
